name: ycodetech/phpcs-standard
description: yCodeTech's custom PHP_CodeSniffer standard with opinionated coding rules and best practices

scripts-descriptions.lint: Run PHP Parallel Lint to check for syntax errors in PHP files.
scripts-descriptions.cs: Run PHPCS to check for coding standards violations.
scripts-descriptions.cbf: Run PHPCBF to fix coding standards violations.
scripts-descriptions.test: Run PHPUnit tests without code coverage.
scripts-descriptions.cs-test-file: Run PHPCS on the test file.
scripts-descriptions.fix-test-file: Run PHPCBF on the test file.
scripts-descriptions.restore-test-file: Restore the test file to its original state.
scripts-descriptions.cs-tests: Run PHPCS on all sniff unit tests.
scripts-descriptions.list-tokens: List all tokens used in the test file.
scripts-descriptions.check-completeness: Check the completeness of the PHPCS standard.
